translations: n．侦探，侦查员：从事侦查、调查工作的人。
· The police department has a team of sleuths working on the case.
警察局有一支侦探团队正在调查这个案件。

sentences.sentence: SLEUTHS are stalking the corridors of London's National Gallery.
sentences.translation: 侦探们正在伦敦国家美术馆的走廊里盘查。

sentences.sentence: Yet the latest report by his sleuths suggests Iran is anything but innocent.
sentences.translation: 但是最新出炉的勘查报告指出伊朗并非无辜。

sentences.sentence: Scientific sleuths will be examining how certain key worker bees may have been targeted as part of their ongoing inquiries.
sentences.translation: 科学研究人员正在检查在多大程度上工蜂已经被确定为正在进行的调查的对象。
